name: Focuslash (WIP)
description:
Dodge enemy attacks, then unleash your own series of targeted slashes in the blink of an eye! 

A small prototype of this sort of combat system, for now the goal is to just survive as long as possible. Will be eventually adding new enemies, actual levels, more QoL, more polish, more features (upgrades!), and basically everything.

  • When yellow bar in the top left of the screen is full, you can begin to focus.
  • When you are focusing, you can set 3 targets upon any enemies within range (the faint circle that appears around you).
  • You damage all enemies you pass through on your way to the targets, so line up your attacks to do the most damage possible!

Press R to restart the game.
